name: AUTH_REQUEST
description: This table contains information about an individual authorization request.

columns.name: AUTH_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the authorization request.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_2_C_NAME
columns.description: The Chronicles record status category ID for the authorization request.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: The external identifier of the authorization request.

columns.name: LAST_EDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) of the latest published (non-draft) contact of the authorization request.

columns.name: REQUEST_CONTEXT_C_NAME
columns.description: The request context category ID for the authorization request.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient/member that this authorization request is for. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral record that this authorization request is associated with.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage record that applies to this authorization request.

columns.name: REQUEST_CREATION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (UTC) that this authorization request was initiated.

columns.name: LOB_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line of business associated with the coverage when the authorization request was processed.

columns.name: LOB_ID_LOB_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line of business record.

columns.name: PAYER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the payer associated with the coverage when the authorization request was processed.

columns.name: PAYER_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the plan associated with the coverage when the authorization request was processed.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: ORDER_ENTRY_ORDER_ID
columns.description: When an authorization request is received, if any of the requested services were created during order entry, this column will be populated as a pointer back to the order.

columns.name: DECISION_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user responsible for the decision of the authorization request. In the case of medical director review, this is the person who conducted the medical director review rather than the user who changed the status in the system. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: UM_DECISION_USER_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description: The decision user role category ID for the user making the decision on the authorization request.

columns.name: RESP_PARTY_AGENCY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the responsibility class of the party responsible for rendering a decision for the authorization request.

columns.name: RESP_PARTY_AGENCY_ID_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the agency.

columns.name: EXT_TRACKED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: Keeps track of the reason why this auth request's turnaround time is tracked externally.

columns.name: APPEALED_AUTH_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: The Authorization Request that was adversely determined and is being appealed by this Request.

columns.name: CREATED_BY_PENDING_CVG_YN
columns.description: This item will be set to Yes if the authorization request was originally created using a pending coverage.

columns.name: PREVIOUS_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: When an Authorization Request is created with a pending coverage, the Authorization Request is eligible for a one-time coverage change. If the coverage is changed, this item will provide a link to the previous coverage.

columns.name: CVG_CHANGE_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: When an Authorization Request is created with a pending coverage, the Authorization Request is eligible for a one-time coverage change. If the coverage is changed, this item indicates if the change was initiated manually by a user or done automatically by the system.

columns.name: CVG_CHANGE_USER_ID
columns.description: When an Authorization Request is created with a pending coverage, the Authorization Request is eligible for a one-time coverage change. If the coverage is changed, this item provides a link to the user that initiated the change.

columns.name: CVG_CHANGE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: When an Authorization Request is created with a pending coverage, the Authorization Request is eligible for a one-time coverage change. If the coverage is changed, this item stores the instant in which the change was made.
